name: ShopBox
description:
A game where you serve your customer by throwing their orders at their faces!

Assets were found on Pinterest, I did not make the customer and food sprites.

Music track

https://soundcloud.com/omori-sound-team

Everything's Gonna Be A-Okay!

//Developpment
Prototype game made in a few days. I believe this idea has a lot of potential, put aside its sub par execution. I hope you will see it like I do ! There is a saying in game design theory that says: "you shouldn't have more fun designing the game than playing it". Needless to say, I did not follow this saying very well. REGARDLESS, I enjoyed making this game, and I hope it can make you giggle for a few minutes !
